org.opensocial.models
Class MediaItem

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.HashMap
          org.json.simple.JSONObject
              org.opensocial.models.Model
                  org.opensocial.models.MediaItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map, org.json.simple.JSONAware, org.json.simple.JSONStreamAware
public class MediaItem
extends Model

OpenSocial model class representing a media item (image, movie, or audio). For reference: http://wiki.opensocial.org/index.php?title=Opensocial.MediaItem_(v0.9) http://www.opensocial.org/Technical-Resources/opensocial-spec-v09/REST-API.html#rfc.section.3.6.2

Author:
Jason Cooper
See Also:
Serialized Form

setId

public void setId(java.lang.String id)
Sets the media item's unique identifier. Required when updating an existing media item; the container generates the identifier when a new media item is created.

Parameters:
id - identifier to set

setAlbumId

public void setAlbumId(java.lang.String albumId)
Sets the identifier of the album to which the media item belongs.

Parameters:
albumId - ID of album intended to contain media item

setUrl

public void setUrl(java.lang.String url)
Sets the URL where the media can be found.

Parameters:
url - URL to set

setThumbnailUrl

public void setThumbnailUrl(java.lang.String thumbnailUrl)
Sets the URL of the media item's thumbnail image as a string.

Parameters:
thumbnailUrl - URL of media item thumbnail to set

setType

public void setType(java.lang.String type)
Sets the media item's type.

Parameters:
type - type to set; must be 'audio', 'image', or 'video'

setMimeType

public void setMimeType(java.lang.String mimeType)
Sets the MIME type of the media item's content.

Parameters:
mimeType - MIME type to set

setCaption

public void setCaption(java.lang.String caption)
Sets the media item's caption/title.

Parameters:
caption - caption/title to set

setDescription

public void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
Sets the media item's description.

Parameters:
description - description to set
